ðŸ“– Summary: ZeroDistraction is a Firefox extension designed to help users stay focused by blocking distracting websites. It allows users to set a timer and block access to specified sites, offering presets for common distractions like social media and news, while also allowing custom exceptions and additional blocked URLs.
